name: Cillian Murphy
description: An acclaimed Irish actor known for his versatile performances across film, television, and stage.

content.title: Biography
content.body: Cillian Murphy was born in 1976 in Cork, Ireland. Initially set to pursue law, he found his passion in acting, making his stage debut in the late 1990s. He quickly transitioned to film, establishing himself as an actor of remarkable range and depth.

content.title: Career
content.body: Murphy gained international fame with his role in Danny Boyle's zombie horror film **28 Days Later**. He has starred in numerous acclaimed films, including **Batman Begins**, **Inception**, and **Peaky Blinders**. His performances are often noted for their intensity and commitment, whether in leading roles or complex supporting characters.

content.title: Notable Collaborations
content.body: Murphy has frequently collaborated with director **Christopher Nolan**, starring in films like **Batman Begins**, **Inception**, and **Oppenheimer**. His work with Nolan has been a significant part of his film career.

content.title: Legacy
content.body: Cillian Murphy's impact on the acting world is evident through his numerous accolades and nominations, including nominations for Golden Globes and British Academy Film Awards. His portrayals have left a lasting imprint, leading him to be regarded as one of the finest actors of his generation.
